comments.content: It must be **[Snell Roundhand Script (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130825065441/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Snell%20Roundhand%20Script%20-%20Bold&fid=3d79e0c10ede2b5d00716d5255830485&fsize=60&text=Jenifer&fit=1)** by Charles Snell, Matthew Carter (Linotype, 1965) available also from Adobe & Bitstream
